explanation: [0-0] In front of a white wall, a little girl in a white top is sitting on the left and a man in a black top is sitting on the right, both making a heart shape with their hands at a table. There are two black shelves on the wall with potted plants, and a brown clock in the upper right corner.

[0-3] First, two hands reach up from the bottom, the left holding a large spoon and the right a small spoon. The girl in white takes the small spoon with her right hand, and the man in black takes the large spoon with his left hand. The man turns his head, frowns, gestures with his right hand to indicate small size, and looks at the girl. The girl raises the spoon in her right hand and looks to the right.

[0-3] First, two hands reach up from the bottom, the left holding a large spoon and the right a small spoon. The girl in white takes the small spoon with her right hand, and the man in black takes the large spoon with his left hand. The man turns his head, frowns, gestures with his right hand to indicate small size, and looks at the girl. The girl raises the spoon in her right hand and looks to the right.

[0-3] First, two hands reach up from the bottom, the left holding a large spoon and the right a small spoon. The girl in white takes the small spoon with her right hand, and the man in black takes the large spoon with his left hand. The man turns his head, frowns, gestures with his right hand to indicate small size, and looks at the girl. The girl raises the spoon in her right hand and looks to the right.

[3-9] Then the scene changes, two hands reach up from the bottom holding two jars of chocolate spread, a large one on the left and a small one on the right. The girl in white smiles and takes the large jar of chocolate spread with both hands, placing it in front of her. The man in black frowns and looks at the large jar, then reaches out his left hand to take the small jar and places it in front of himself. The girl opens the lid with her left hand. The man frowns, his mouth corners down, and puts the lid aside with his left hand. The girl scoops up a spoonful of chocolate spread with her right hand and takes a bite, then turns to look at the small jar of chocolate spread. The man's large spoon gets stuck in the mouth of the jar, he holds up the spoon, frowns, opens his mouth slightly, and looks ahead. The girl turns her head to look at the man, opens her left hand and places it on the side of her face, and moves her mouth a few times.
